18943201.title: Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport
18943201.extract: Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, also known as Atlanta Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport, Atlanta Airport, Hartsfield, or Hartsfield-Jackson, is the primary international airport serving Atlanta, Georgia, United States. It is located approximately 7 miles (11 km) south of the Downtown Atlanta district. The airport is named after former Atlanta mayors William B. Hartsfield and Maynard Jackson.
